page.description: Create a SQL::ResultSet object for an ADODB RecordSet.
page.prototype: SQL::ResultSet ResultSetFromADORecordSet(RecordSet as P [, Connection as P])
page.discussion: The SQL::Connection::ResultSetFromADORecordSet()creates a SQL::ResultSet object for an open ADO RecordSet. This object can be passed to SQL update functions. The Record set (and connection if provided) will be closed when the ResultSet goes out of scope.
